scripts.packages: electron-packager . simple-vocabulary-builder --overwrite --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --icon=assets/logo.icns --prune=true --out=release-builds && electron-packager . simple-vocabulary-builder --overwrite --asar --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --icon=assets/logo.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds && electron-packager . simple-vocabulary-builder --overwrite --asar --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=assets/logo.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds && electron-packager . simple-vocabulary-builder --overwrite --asar --platform=linux --arch=x64 --icon=assets/logo.png --prune=true --out=release-builds
scripts.installers: electron-installer-dmg ./release-builds/simple-vocabulary-builder-darwin-x64/simple-vocabulary-builder.app simple-vocabulary-builder --out=installers/mac --overwrite=true --title='Simple Vocabulary Builder' --icon=assets/logo.icns && cd installers/windows && node createinstaller.js
